title: Questions about build up Siddur manual ?
author: joshualinog
excerpt: # questions  ### participation? - [ ] who should participate? How often should the participate? In a given gathering? How long should they contribute?
content:
# questions 
### participation?
- [ ] who should participate? How often should the participate? In a given gathering? How long should they contribute?

#### hierarchy 
- [ ] should someone run the gathering? Should they practice by running watches first? Should it be priestly? Universal like the priesthood running the little shabbats? Isn't it universal if they could all be selected by casting lots? What about the distinction between the high priest and his role in Shabbat?
